globalSummary: Major payment corridors connect the Americas, Europe, and Asia Pacific. XRP-facilitated cross-border flows exceed $8B monthly across active corridors.

items.title: US-Mexico corridor leads remittance volume

items.title: US-Philippines corridor grows 34% YoY
